text: (ivvivaram aracarukku aṟivikkappaṭṭatum) avarai eṉṉiṭam aḻaittu vāruṅkaḷ" eṉṟu aracar kūṟiṉār; (avaruṭaiya) tūtar yūsuḥpiṭam vantapōtu avar, "nīr um ejamāṉariṭam tirumpic ceṉṟu, 'tam kaikaḷai veṭṭikkoṇṭa peṇkaḷiṉ uṇmai nilai eṉṉa?' Eṉṟu avariṭam kēḷum. Niccayamāka eṉ iṟaivaṉ appeṇkaḷiṉ catiyai naṉku aṟintavaṉāka irukkiṉṟaṉāṉ" eṉṟu kūṟiṉār
